text:
just wanted to state I had started working on converting the Bootstrap 4 grid scss to HubL, I haven’t had time to get back to it quite yet but if anyone’s interested in helping feel free to pop in there.

I figured I’d use Bootstraps code verbatim for the way the grid works so developers have consistency, and the reliability BS is known for, then I would add my backward compatibility code for the HS forced grid.
